    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int customerIdNumber
      Each test grabs unique customer ID(s) via getNextCustomerId() to avoid problems if/when we run the tests multi-threaded.

      • tableCreate

        public static CreateTableResult tableCreate()
        Table management helper function that creates a Dynamo DB table suitable for storing user Schedules.
        Returns:
        null on failure. Otherwise a CreateTableResult that includes information about the newly-created table.

      • tableDelete

        public static boolean tableDelete()
        Table management helper function that deletes a Dynamo DB table.
        Returns:
        true if table was successfully deleted

      • itemCreateVersion1

        public PutItemOutcome itemCreateVersion1(String customerId)
        Create a table item using "document" db access in version 1 format. Contains fields: CustomerId, TimeZone, Schedule, and IntentLog.
        Parameters:
        customerId - String of this user's id
        Returns:
        PutItemOutcome of the item write

      • itemCreateCurrentVersion

        public void itemCreateCurrentVersion(String customerId)
        Create a table item using "item persistence" db access in current format. Contains fields: CustomerId, TimeZone, Calendar, and IntentLog.
        Parameters:
        customerId - String of this user's id

      • itemCount

        public static Integer itemCount(String customerId)
        Table item helper function that counts how many items in the Dynamo DB table exist for the given customer id.
        Parameters:
        customerId - String customer identifier
        Returns:
        Number of table items existing for this customer

      • itemDelete

        public static void itemDelete(String customerId)
        Table item helper function to remove item(s) that match the given customer id.
        Parameters:
        customerId - String customer identifier
